thread.title: BRIEF-Disney Announces Transformative Multi-Year Expansion For Disneyland Paris

title: BRIEF-Disney Announces Transformative Multi-Year Expansion For Disneyland Paris

organizations.name: brief-disney announces transformative multi-year expansion for disney

text: 19 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Disney Announces Transformative Multi-Year Expansion For Disneyland Paris Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co: * DISNEY ANNOUNCES TRANSFORMATIVE MULTI-YEAR EXPANSION FOR DISNEYLAND PARIS * DISNEY ANNOUNCES MULTI-YEAR EXPANSION FOR DISNEYLAND PARIS * DISNEY SAYS PLANS FOR 2 BILLION EURO EXPANSION FOR DISNEYLAND PARIS * DISNEY SAYS ‍MULTI-YEAR DEVELOPMENT WILL ROLL OUT IN PHASES BEGINNING IN 2021, SIGNIFICANTLY EXPANDING WALT DISNEY STUDIOS PARK​ * WALT DISNEY - NEW DEVELOPMENT TO INCLUDE TRANSFORMATION OF WALT DISNEY STUDIOS PARK, ADDING 3 NEW AREAS BASED ON MARVEL, FROZEN & STAR WARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
